mapper.sql: SCHED_NAME, JOB_NAME, JOB_GROUP, DESCRIPTION, JOB_CLASS_NAME, IS_DURABLE, IS_NONCONCURRENT, IS_UPDATE_DATA, REQUESTS_RECOVERY, JOB_DATA
mapper.select: SELECT c.TRIGGER_NAME triggerName, c.TRIGGER_GROUP triggerGroup, c.JOB_NAME jobName, c.JOB_GROUP jobGroup, c.DESCRIPTION triggerDescription, c.TRIGGER_STATE triggerState, c.START_TIME startTime, c.END_TIME endTime, c.NEXT_FIRE_TIME nextFirtTime, c.PREV_FIRE_TIME prevFirtTime, e.JOB_CLASS_NAME jobClassName, e.DESCRIPTION jobDescription, d.CRON_EXPRESSION cronExpression FROM qrtz_triggers c INNER JOIN qrtz_cron_triggers d ON c.TRIGGER_NAME = d.TRIGGER_NAME AND c.TRIGGER_GROUP = d.TRIGGER_GROUP INNER JOIN qrtz_job_details e ON e.JOB_NAME = c.JOB_NAME AND e.JOB_GROUP = c.JOB_GROUP
